articles.content: OnePlus 9 series is all set to launch on March 23. OnePlus has partnered with Swedish photography company Hasselblad this time around to up their camera game, and the phones are also confirmed to bun… [+2637 chars]

articles.title: Poco X3 Pro Price, Specifications, and Colour Options Surface Ahead of Launch; Poco F3 Spotted on SIRIM S... - Gadgets 360
articles.description: Poco X3 Pro is reported to launch globally and may be priced at EUR 250 (roughly Rs. 21,600) for the 6GB + 128GB storage model and EUR 300 (roughly Rs. 26,000) for the 8GB + 256GB storage option. Check out more leaked details on the upcoming phone.

articles.author: Debashis Sarkar
articles.title: Oppo F19 Pro Plus 5G launched at Rs 25,990: All details about Oppo’s new 5G phone - Gadgets Now
articles.description: Oppo has launched its new 5G phone flaunting high quality cameras, 50W fast charging and attractive design. There’s only one variant of the phone with 8GB RAM+128GB storage at Rs 25,990. Here’s all the details.
articles.content: There's a dual nano SIM card slot. Talking about 5G, the supported bands include 5G (NR TDD): N77/N78/N41, 5G (NR FDD): N1.
